titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Susie Hoogasian Villa papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Folklorist, collector of folktales, editor of "100 Armenian tales and their folklorist relevance," and author of "Armenian village life before 1914."
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence, biographical material, newsletters, and other materials relating to her studies and publications; also drafts of "100 Armenian tales and their folklorist relevance," including biographical information about the individuals from whom the tales gathered, "Armenian village life before 1914," and her master's thesis "A study of the style, narrator techniques, and motifs of the Armenian folktale."
